SEARCH
Package controller.interfaces

Interface PatientService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PatientController
public interface PatientService
Interface for managing patient-related operations, including appointment handling, patient records, and doctor-patient interactions.

  • Method Details

    • getPatientsUnderCare

      List<Patient> getPatientsUnderCare(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves a list of patients currently under the care of a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor whose patients are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of patients under the care of the specified doctor.

    • getPastAppointmentRecords

      List<AppointmentOutcomeRecord> getPastAppointmentRecords(Patient patient)
      Retrieves a list of past appointment records for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient whose past appointment records are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of AppointmentOutcomeRecord objects representing the patient's past appointments.

    • addPatient

      void addPatient(Patient patient)
      Adds a new patient to the system.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient object to be added.

    • getPatient

      Patient getPatient(String patientId)
      Retrieves a patient by their unique patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The unique ID of the patient to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The Patient object associated with the provided patient ID.

    • getAllPatients

      List<Patient> getAllPatients()
      Retrieves a list of all patients in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all Patient objects.

    • existsPatient

      boolean existsPatient(String patientId)
      Checks if a patient exists in the system based on their patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The patient ID to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if the patient exists, false otherwise.

    • getUpcomingAppointments

      List<Appointment> getUpcomingAppointments(String patientId)
      Retrieves a list of upcoming appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient whose upcoming appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects representing the patient's upcoming appointments.

    • getAllAppointments

      List<Appointment> getAllAppointments(String patientId)
      Retrieves a list of all appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient whose appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of all Appointment objects for the specified patient.

    • hasAnyPendingAppointments

      boolean hasAnyPendingAppointments(String patientId)
      Checks if a specific patient has any pending appointments.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if the patient has any pending appointments, false otherwise.

    • hasAnyConfirmedAppointments

      boolean hasAnyConfirmedAppointments(String patientId)
      Checks if a specific patient has any confirmed appointments.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if the patient has any confirmed appointments, false otherwise.

    • getNextAppointment

      Optional<Appointment> getNextAppointment(String patientId)
      Retrieves the next upcoming appointment for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient whose next appointment is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the next appointment if available, or an empty Optional if no upcoming appointments exist.

    • canScheduleNewAppointment

      boolean canScheduleNewAppointment(String patientId)
      Checks if a specific patient can schedule a new appointment based on their current appointment status.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if the patient can schedule a new appointment, false otherwise.

    • getAppointmentsWithDoctor

      List<Appointment> getAppointmentsWithDoctor(String patientId, Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves a list of appointments for a specific patient with a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient whose appointments with the specified doctor are to be retrieved.
      doctor - The doctor whose appointments with the patient are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects representing the patient's appointments with the specified doctor.

    • cancelAllPendingAppointments

      void cancelAllPendingAppointments(String patientId)
      Cancels all pending appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient whose pending appointments are to be cancelled.

    • validatePatient

      void validatePatient(String patientId)
      Validates the existence of a patient using their patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient to be validated.
